```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,
                      fig.path = 'figures/')
```
```{r deps, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r summary}
dat <- read_tsv(here('results', 'sensspec_concat.tsv'))
dat %>% select(dataset, cluster_method, mothur_version, filetype, mcc, sobs, numotus)
```


```{r plot_mcc, dpi=300}
dat %>% ggplot(aes(x=mothur_version, y=mcc, color=cluster_method, shape=dataset)) +
  geom_point(position = position_jitter(width=0.1, height = 0),
             size = 5, alpha=0.7) +
  ylim(0,1) +
  theme_bw()
```
